content:
I want to send a client a proposal on a job she is hiring and here are my packages

- Content provided by you
- Thumbnail
- Caption
- Hashtags
- Scheduling

\*For TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn

Total Total $150 w/ The cuisine

—— ADDONS ——
- Social Media Automation for Messenger, Instagram, SMS, Emails, WhatsApp
- Designing of regular social media posts
- Website SEO and Copywriting

\*For TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn

Total With Addons $239.5 w/ The cuisine

Assuming transaction fees, US tax and others

Lets go for ~
Total On Everything $283/month
